Description: A new Storage tab will be added to usage report for SharePoint within the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new tab will provide visibility into storage quota consumption, a usage trend, and recommended actions and resources for storage management and optimization

Title: Outlook: MIP sensitivity label support S/MIME in new Outlook for Windows
Description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) signing and encryption as an outcome of sensitivity labels. Admins can use set label advanced setting to define the label to have S/MIME sign or encryption or both, and emails with those labels applied will enforce S/MIME sign and encrypt accordingly. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: OneDrive: OneDrive files as knowledge sources for agents
Description: Allow files from OneDrive to be added as a grounding source in the Sources tab when creating a custom agent. This would apply to agents created from both OneDrive and SharePoint.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot generated summaries for call transfers on Teams phone devices
Description: Copilot generated summary provides an overview of the details and outcomes of transferred calls. It includes information such as the caller's details, the reason for the transfer, and the final resolution.

Title: Outlook: Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows
Description: Declarative Agents have already rolled out to Microsoft 365 Copilot chat, with this update we will be adding support for the same set of agents in Copilot chat in Outlook too. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Windows 365: Available from New Zealand North
Description: Windows 365 will be available in New Zealand North.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
Description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a Sharepoint OAL (Organization Asset Library) you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images

Title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
Description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Policy sync status on Purview portal
Description: The Policy Sync Status feature enables solution admins to know the policy sync status directly from the Policy page in Purview portal. When a policy is created or updated by a user, the changes are distributed to the locations selected. This new feature will give users insight into whether the policy changes have reached the target locations. This policy sync status feature is available for DLP (excluding endpoint policies), Information Protection, Data Loss Management, Records Management, Information Barriers, and Priva.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add hyperlink support in warn and block toast messages
Description: With this feature, data officers can now embed hyperlinks within toast messages for specific rules. When this rule is triggered, the end user will see a toast with a customized title and message with a hyperlink. This feature is useful when organizations need to direct users to a specific resource or a repository for more specific instruction (e.g. internal policy SharePoint site).

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse users can assign other users as delegates
Description: Viva Pulse users can now assign other users as delegates to create and send pulses on their behalf.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Audio summary of your file
Description: Copilot can generate audio summaries of your file, making information easy to consume anywhere.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): LLM generated titles for Copilot Chat sessions
Description: Easily locate your Copilot Chat sessions with LLM generated titles.

Title: Microsoft Teams: GCC High support in Teams Rooms Pro Management
Description: The Pro Management service and admin portal is now available for GCC High customer tenants.

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft 365 Copilot for GCC Moderate
Description: We will be introducing a new Usage report covering Microsoft 365 Copilot. This report will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per Microsoft 365 app, and user-level activity insights (anonymized by default).

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Audience breakdown tooltip
Description: Amplify reports will provide a breakdown of the channels shown in the Unique viewers card. The tool tip will show the top 5 channel audiences and their contribution to the overall numbers for each publication channel presented in the report.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Chat now offers meeting series selection on CIQ Menu
Description: Users will now be able to select meeting series and related instances from CIQ to submit as part of their prompts to Copilot Chat.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): The chat experience now offers better search refinement on CIQ menu Files tab
Description: Users will now be able to use File Type filters and People refiners to apply search criteria to get to relevant files faster in the CIQ menu.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Rich artifacts in Copilot Pages
Description: You can now create rich artifacts, including interactive charts, tables, complex diagrams, and code created with Copilot from enterprise or web data. Artifacts can be added to Pages to further edit and refine with Copilot. They are interactive and stay in sync across Microsoft 365 when shared for collaborative work.

Title: SharePoint: OneDrive and SharePoint – Protect PDF with password
Description: SharePoint and OneDrive users can now secure their PDF files by adding protection that restricts unauthorized access through OneDrive Web. This feature allows you to set an open password, which is required to access the PDF, or an owner password, which sets permissions for actions such as printing or editing the document. This ensures your files remain secure and only accessible to authorized individuals

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - CSOD permissions sync in Viva Learning
Description: Access permissions to learning content set in CSOD using Organizational Units are honored and reflected in Viva Learning.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent recap for calls from chat and ‘Meet now’ meetings now available for GCC High
Description: Intelligent meeting recap will be available in GCC High for impromptu calls and meetings, like those started from ‘Meet now’ and calls started from chat. You can easily browse the recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions after the ad-hoc meeting ends. This capability will be available for users with a Teams Premium or M365 Copilot license.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enhanced Copilot in Engage
Description: Copilot in Engage has now been integrated with M365,providing the same rich access to the M365 Graph, and helping you natively access Microsoft data in the flow of Engage.  Alongside this update, you can expect improved AI-powered writing assistance that bring in email/chat/files data to help craft both the content and style of your message

Title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing the New Republish Feature in Viva Amplify
Description: We’re excited to launch Republish, a new feature that keeps your content fresh, extends its reach, and maximizes engagement across SharePoint, Viva Engage, Outlook, and Teams. Update existing published content in a few clicks, re-share key messages to new audiences or channels, correct errors and refine your messaging —all without starting from scratch. Republish in Viva Amplify makes content management effortless.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for historical imports
Description: This feature will introduce an alternative solution to the existing Advanced Configurations feature that allows an Admin to perform historical imports into the Viva Glint platform.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for retroactive updates
Description: This feature will introduce an alternative solution to the existing Advanced Configurations feature that allows an Admin to retroactively update attributes associated to surveys.

Title: Microsoft 365: Long-term retention period for M365 Backup
Description: This creates the ability to set longer term retention periods to restore beyond one year.

Title: SharePoint: Chat one-on-one with SharePoint agents in Teams
Description: Users can chat one-on-one with a SharePoint agent directly within Teams chat.

Title: Outlook: Copilot Pages – View, edit & share in Outlook Mobile
Description: Continue working with Copilot and colleagues while on the go, with the ability to view, edit and share Pages on mobile.

Title: Outlook: Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot available in Copilot Chat in classic Outlook for Windows
Description: We will be adding declarative agents support for agents in Copilot Chat in Outlook. This roadmap item tracks availability in classic Outlook for Windows.

Title: Whiteboard: Sticky notes accelerator
Description: Sticky note accelerators will help users work faster in Whiteboard by simplifying adding sticky notes. With a single click, users can quickly add sticky notes, making brainstorming and collaboration seamless.

Title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
Description: Annotating with hand-drawn content in the OneDrive apps for iOS and iPadOS is now easier than ever. Enjoy various types of annotation tools and expressive strokes that match your pressure.

Title: SharePoint: Card animation
Description: Card animation will enable motion for web parts on Pages and News.

Title: Outlook: Time Suggestions assistance while creating new meetings
Description: Get assistance with time suggestions when creating new meetings in modern Outlook. This feature is currently supported for non-recurring meetings only. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Windows 365: Local desktop access for Windows 365 Boot user
Description: This feature enables end users to return to their physical PC using the CTRL-ALT-DEL screen or from Cloud PC error screens when their device is in Boot mode. Administrators can configure and customize this feature within the Guided Scenario for Boot.

Title: Windows 365: Available from Mexico Central, Spain Central
Description: Windows 365 will be available in Mexico Central and Spain Central.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365):  Microsoft Copilot Chat and Microsoft 365 Copilot - Users can insert cloud files in Copilot chat prompts.
Description: In the Web tab in Microsoft 365 Copilot and in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, users can access Microsoft One Drive or Microsoft SharePoint to find and insert cloud files in their prompts.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention –  Configure network share groups using IP or IP address range
Description: With this feature, data officers can now configure specific IP addresses or IP address ranges in DLP Settings within Sensitive service domain groups to be used in DLP policies for more precise scoping.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Enhance the Comment Experience for Live Surveys
Description: Updating the survey experience to provide ability to display the comment box on the screen when a user is providing a rating. Currently, the survey automatically progresses to the next question after the user selects a rating, without giving them an opportunity to leave a comment. With this change, the program will have the ability for the comment box will be persistently visible, encouraging users to provide more qualitative feedback alongside their rating.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create a PowerPoint slide from a file or prompt
Description: Creating impactful slides can be challenging and time-consuming. Copilot helps you quickly turn your ideas and files into a fully designed slide with content ready to edit and refine, making the presentation creation and refinement process more personalized and efficient.

Title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive file-level archiving
Description: This introduces archiving at the file level for Microsoft 365 Archive.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Search past sessions in Copilot Chat
Description: Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.

Title: Add multiple SharePoint agents in a single Teams conversation
Description: Users can include more than one SharePoint agent as a participant in a Teams group chat, meeting chat, or channel.

Title: SharePoint: SharePoint agents are available in Teams app Store
Description: You can find and add SharePoint agents from the Teams app Store.

Title: SharePoint: SharePoint agents in Teams Mobile
Description: Use SharePoint agents in Teams Mobile group chats and meetings.

Title: SharePoint: SharePoint Agents in Teams Channels
Description: SharePoint agents can be used in a Teams Channel similar to how they can be used in a Teams Group Chat.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Add Allow/Off mode for each Action type overall enforcement
Description: Currently Endpoint DLP only supports Audit only, Block, Block with override. This feature will add Off and Allow. Off means Endpoint DLP will not fire any event/Alert and will not trigger any toast. Customer can use this enforcement mode to have restriction for specific group. Allow means Endpoint DLP will not fire any Alert and will not trigger any toast but will fire event on Activity Explorer.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution in Teams Rooms on Android
Description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition, transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in Teams Rooms on Android. Intelligent speaker functionalities are brought to existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams Premium in meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. This feature requires a Teams Rooms Pro license.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Multi-language posts
Description: Authors of Viva Engage posts will be able to add multiple manually written translations to a single post.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
Description: Once you connect your asset library hosted with Templafy to Microsoft365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Recap changes over more time
Description: Recapping the changes you made in Loop is no longer limited to the current session. You can now recap changes that were made over a longer period of time.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: Enrich the details of the auto forwarded emails in the Exchange DLP
Description: We are excited to introduce an enhancement to our system that will provide more accurate and detailed information for forwarded emails. This new feature will ensure that the correct user, recipient information, and email evidence are displayed in the alert generated. This improvement will help admins accurately trace the origin and intended recipient of forwarded emails, reducing confusion and minimizing the risk of false positives. The update will be reflected in our audit logs, alerts page, and activity explorer page

Title: Windows 365: Windows app on Android GA, including MAM support
Description: Mobile Application Management (MAM) support GA will be aligned with Windows App on Android GA.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Report a Message for External Collaboration
Description: Teams users can now report security risks and concerns in external one-on-one, group and meeting chats.

Title: SharePoint: Edit SharePoint site's built-in agent
Description: Allows the built in SharePoint agent to be edited without having to create a new agent for the site.

Title: Microsoft Viva: SharePoint agent analytics on Viva Insights
Description: Explore how your employees used key SharePoint agent features over a given time period and understand the ROI.

Title: SharePoint: Agent usage statistics per SharePoint site
Description: SharePoint agents' usage statistics will be available for every SharePoint site. This will be available on the site analytics page for the site owner persona. This will also include analytics on how many times source files are cited.

Title: SharePoint: Share site's built-in agent
Description: Allows the built in SharePoint agent on a site to be shared and used in Teams.

Title: Microsoft Viva: New Viva Glint Tenant Administrator Role
Description: We are excited to announce the upcoming Viva Glint Tenant Administrator role in Microsoft Entra. With this role, admins will have dedicated permissions to manage Viva Glint-related settings in the Microsoft 365 Admin Center (MAC), without requiring the elevated privileges of Global or User admin roles. This role is essential for users who need to: read and configure all settings of Viva Glint in MAC, assign Viva Glint service admins, and create or manage Azure support tickets.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Email Previews for Live Surveys
Description: Customers can preview and test email notifications for survey start (available in VG), survey reminder and survey end/results rollout after configuring and approving program settings.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention: Full file evidence support for restricted apps
Description: Full File Evidence supports activities like Cloud egress, paste to supported browser, copy to USB, Network share, RDP, Bluetooth app. Now we are expanding full file evidence collection for unallowed apps as well.

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Loop workspaces for Microsoft 365 GCC
Description: Loop workspaces and the full Loop app experience are available to Microsoft 365 GCC customers at loop.cloud.microsoft.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP shows full path of target domain
Description: Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Device and Device group-based policy scoping support for Endpoint DLP
Description: Currently, you can create a Purview Endpoint DLP policy and assign it to specific users or user groups. This feature will allow you to create and release features based on both users and machines. You can use this feature to achieve different policies for the same user on different devices.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - New Allow and Off modes for each activity
Description: The two new modes are Off and Allow. For Off, Endpoint DLP will not trigger events or Alerts and will not trigger notifications. Admins can use this enforcement mode to configure restrictions for a specific group. With Allow, Endpoint DLP will not trigger Alerts and will not trigger notifications but will trigger events in Activity explorer.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
Description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Increasing policy template limits for Insider Risk Management
Description:
Insider Risk Management will increase policy creation limits from 20 policies per template to 100 maximum overall active policies. For example, an organization may have 50 data leak policy templates because the limit will now apply to all active policies versus each policy template. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Customize the location of Teams notifications on web
Description: You can now customize where your Teams notification appear on your screen when using Teams on web. Options include bottom right, top right, bottom left, and top left, allowing you to choose the most convenient and least intrusive location for a better experience and productivity.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Support for inline videos and GIFs in articles
Description: This adds support for inline videos and GIFs in Viva Engage articles.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management for Copilot in Viva Glint
Description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable Microsoft 365 Copilot in Viva Glint for specific users through the M365 admin center.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updates to Copilot Chat prompt input box
Description: This update aligns Copilot Chat prompt input box across chat experiences.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Create channels with ease
Description: Efficiently create channels directly from the header menu, eliminating the need to scroll down to the specific team. As a channel creator, you will have the flexibility to choose from all the teams you can create a channel in to host your new channel.

Title: OneDrive: Upcoming change to shared folder experience in Microsoft OneDrive
Description: With this feature update, when a user clicks a link to a shared folder from Teams chat, channels, email, or other places, they will navigate to the shared folder within the People view of their own OneDrive. This new view, organized by people, will show and allow access to all the files and folders that have been shared with the user.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - 'AI & Copilot Resources' provider availability to all Viva Learning users
Description: The 'AI & Copilot Resources' provider will be enabled by default for all Viva Learning users. Administrators will have the ability to manage the visibility of this provider within Viva Learning

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
Description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
Description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Recommended thresholds
Description:
With this update, admins with the appropriate permissions can get tailored recommended thresholds for all the built-in indicators within the policy wizard. This feature enables organizations to fine tune their insider risk policies and get an optimal number of alerts. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry can ground their agent in files stored in SharePoint
Description: Tenant Graph grounding provides grounding for agents with relevant information from Microsoft Graph, including files stored in SharePoint. This capability is now available to developers building agents in Azure AI Foundry.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Ability to export policy settings
Description: Insider Risk Management will now supply the ability to export policy configuration settings into a CSV. Any user with admin permissions will be able to export the settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - SharePoint results integration in Viva Learning Search
Description: Users will be able to discover relevant internal SharePoint content seamlessly while searching within Viva Learning, ensuring they have access to all pertinent resources in one place.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva Learning surfaces personalized according to User skills
Description: Viva Learning surfaces will be personalized based on user-selected skills and inferred skills derived from their role and activity within the Microsoft Graph. This ensures that the learning content is tailored to each user's unique needs and professional context.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy reports in Viva Insights
Description: Usage reporting for Copilot Academy will be available in Viva Insights via the Analyst Workbench. Users can access these reports through Excel or a PowerBI dashboard.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Semantic search support for in-app Searches
Description: Semantic search capability understands context and nuances of user queries, providing more accurate and relevant results.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Central community membership approval experience revamped
Description: The centralized community membership approval experience undergoes a revamp to make it easier for community admins to manage approval requests for all communities they administer, in ONE single place.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Editing and viewing community 'info' revamped
Description: Revamp the community "info" experience to be in line with the existing Engage user patterns. Editing the info, will now be available within the settings experience. Users can read the info from the "About" section additionally.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Export Enhancements
Description:
With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. 
Key changes with export enhancements:
The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for Ediscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages.
Additionally, for Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. 
Other changes coming through are:
- Change in Export limits and ZIP folder partitioning
- Better Export settings with more options
- New reporting capabilities
- Enhancements in Results load file

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Pronoun Awareness in Microsoft 365 Copilot
Description: Microsoft 365 Copilot will soon use pronouns from user profiles when responding, creating a more personalized interaction for users.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work
Description: Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Suggestions for slide templates as you work
Description: Now, instantly get suggestions for slide templates to use while creating slides in PowerPoint. Insert a new slide or start typing the slide name or type of slide and see suggestions in the Copilot Suggestions pane.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms has been refreshed to help users better refine and edit their forms
Description: Copilot in Forms has been revamped to more easily help users refine and modify their forms. Users can now type prompts to Copilot to help with editing and refinement, so they can get tailored suggestions and easily get their forms ready to send.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can now reference files to help generate drafts
Description: When creating a form with Copilot, users can now reference existing documents such as Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Users can also reference an existing form by pasting the form's URL into the prompt box. Additionally, Copilot can search and suggest relevant files when generating a form, so users can easily create a draft that meets their needs.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy availability to all Microsoft 365 users
Description: Copilot Academy will be accessible to users without Copilot licenses. Admins will have the option to select their preferred access settings for Copilot Academy.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Direct Routing Call Troubleshooting via SIP Ladder
Description: We are launching the SIP Ladder diagram tool in Teams Admin center to enable admins to troubleshoot their Direct Routing calls in a self-serve way. This feature will be available via the Usage reports page under Teams Admin center. It will also enable admins to view the SIP requests, responses and associated SDP data between Microsoft teams proxy and the SBC through which the call was routed. This data will be available for all calls made more than 30 minutes and less than 30 days ago.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms can help monitor response collection and insights
Description: Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need with much less effort. Copilot can create a collection plan, track your progress, and let you know when to take action with reminders and insights. Forms can notify you when early insights are ready, and you can easily continue your analysis with Copilot in Excel. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter collection and analysis.

Title: Outlook: Group messages as conversation for PST files in new Outlook for Windows
Description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to group messages as conversation for emails within .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows, #pstfilesupport

Title: Microsoft Viva: Advanced moderation access control for corporate communicators
Description: Network admins can choose to enable advanced moderation access for corporate communicators to manage AI themes + keywords detected within organization.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Centralized admin role management from Engage admin center
Description: Manage network admin, verified admin & corporate communicator role enablement/ disablement from within the Engage admin center.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Quick Summarizations in eDiscovery
Description:
Introducing the "Quick Summarization" feature for eDiscovery in Purview Copilot—designed to streamline case management with an intuitive, at-a-glance overview. This new capability allows users to quickly access a comprehensive summary of eDiscovery cases, holds, and searches, eliminating the need to navigate through multiple tabs to assess status, statistics of completed actions, pending tasks, and ongoing jobs.

The "Quick Summarization" feature consolidates this information into a single, easy-to-understand summary. Additionally, similar summary views are available for both Search and Hold within the eDiscovery case. Powered by existing “contextual summary” skill, the system analyzes case/search/hold metadata and generates natural language summaries, providing users with a clear, actionable overview of key details in real-time.

Title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (iPhone)
Description: With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Separate role added for downloading the original file evidence for Endpoint
Description: Microsoft Purview has introduced a new separate role for downloading the original evidence for Endpoint. It is applicable for both Customer Managed and Microsoft Managed storage when you try to download the evidence using Purview or XDR portal.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Keyword monitoring enhancements
Description:
Network and Verified admins can setup specific keywords to monitor across conversations in their network. The enhancements include a new, modern experience of the existing functionality. 

Keyword monitoring will now accessible in the new communications dashboard experience within the advanced moderation page. The feature is no longer available in the Engage admin center.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Communications Dashboard
Description: A central hub for corporate communicators and network administrators to access information and manage tasks across the communications lifecycle, starting with campaigns, analytics, leader and audiences, and advanced moderation.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Facilitator agent notetaking in meetings
Description: The Facilitator agent takes real-time notes during your Teams meetings, allowing everyone to co-author and collaborate seamlessly. This frees everyone up to focus and engage deeply in meetings, while also helping drive alignment before the meeting ends.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in macOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
Description: Data classification on files in macOS devices will be triggered when handing files on read access to improve classification operations.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Monitor Teams client updates in Teams Admin center
Description: IT Administrators can now monitor Teams client version update adoption and access detailed adoption information. This feature enables administrators to proactively understand version adoption, assess version health, and access granular details about devices and users who are on the latest client versions. Additionally, it provides visibility on recency of client versions. Administrators can now proactively view insights and address issues preventing users from automatically updating to the latest and most secure version of the Teams client.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Sessions Grouped by Time frame
Description: This feature will provide users conversation history list structure through grouping conversations by time frame to make it easy for users to visually parse.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Labeling improvement for non-Office/PDF files using endpoint DLP
Description: This allows the customer to use a label for a non-Office/PDF file without productivity impact.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
Description: Once you connect your asset library, hosted with Templafy, to Microsoft 365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Moderation Agent
Description: Network admins and corporate communicators can input custom themes of interest and track new conversations that match these themes. Theme monitoring is accessible in the new communications dashboard experience in the advanced moderation page.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Teams client health dashboards in Teams Admin Center
Description: IT Administrators can view and monitor the health of Teams desktop clients on both Windows and Mac platforms. This feature offers comprehensive admin actionable insights into client health metrics, including client crashes and launch failures. Administrators are equipped with detailed information on issues, insights, and mitigation tools to promptly and effectively address any potential client health problems.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Hold limits increased per hold policy for eDiscovery Premium
Description:
The Purview eDiscovery team has increased the limits for Hold policies for eDiscovery Premium in the new purview.microsoft.com portal. 

The maximum number of mailboxes in a single case hold has been increased from 1,000 to 2,000. This limit includes the combined total of user mailboxes and the mailboxes associated with Microsoft 365 Groups, Microsoft Teams, and Viva Engage Groups.

The maximum number of sites in a single case hold has been increased from 100 to 2,000. This limit includes the combined total of OneDrive for Business sites, SharePoint sites, and the sites associated with Microsoft 365 Groups, Microsoft Teams, and Viva Engage Groups. 

Overall, the maximum allowed locations in a premium case hold policy in a premium case is 4,000 (2,000 each). This is possible through the new user interface in Purview portal and not through the Classic eDiscovery experience. Additionally, this is not currently possible with Graph. The maximum hold limits for a standard case remain the same as earlier: 1,000 mailboxes and 100 sites. All other settings for eDiscovery hold continue as is. 

Lastly, in case of license downgrade, the system won't remove any existing holds and won't allow adding more, such as for a policy with a higher number of locations in it (e.g. 1500 Mailbox and 1500 Sites), and if the case setting is downgraded to E3, you will not be able to add more locations in it based on E3 limits, but you will be able to remove locations from it.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Embedded Knowledge capability support for declarative agents.
Description: Developers and makers can embed knowledge (pdf, doc/docx, ppt) into their declarative agents built with Teams Toolkit for additional grounding capabilities.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Ability to use the Graph connector selector when using Teams Toolkit
Description: Developers using Teams Toolkit to author declarative agents can select specific Graph connectors to improve their knowledge grounding.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
Description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a SharePoint OAL (Organization Asset Library), you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
Description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a SharePoint OAL (Organization Asset Library), you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

Title: Outlook: Support for enhanced calendar-sharing architecture in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
Description: This update improves the reliability of calendar sharing and ensures that the events seen by delegates are always up to date. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Support for file upload
Description: Viva Amplify will support authors uploading a file with a list of emails to make it easier for the Outlook channel to reach large audiences.

Title: Outlook: Open previous email with Email Auto-advance
Description: This feature allows users to automatically open the message above the current one in the message list after performing actions like moving or deleting the current message. Users can turn this behavior on in the "Email Auto-advance" Mail setting.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Introducing the SCO Setting in Walkie Talkie app for Enhanced Battery Life on older Bluetooth headsets
Description: This feature introduces SCO (Synchronous Connection-Oriented) user setting in the Walkie Talkie app. This feature is designed to manage the Bluetooth headset connection to optimize battery life. When a Bluetooth headset is connected to the Walkie Talkie app, the SCO setting controls whether the microphone remains constantly connected or disconnects after a period of inactivity. This helps in reducing battery drain by allowing the headset to disconnect when not in use and reconnect when needed.  The user control feature allows users to set a timeout period after which the Bluetooth headset will automatically disconnect if there is no activity. While the SCO setting is turned on, users may experience a slight delay in transmission as the headset reconnects. However, once the headset is reconnected, users will hear a sound indicating that they can start transmitting on the app. This brief delay is a small trade-off for the substantial battery savings on older Bluetooth headsets.

Title: Microsoft Clipchamp: Editor simplification and introduction of light mode
Description: This change will simplify the Clipchamp editing experience and increase the space you have on the stage to make great videos. We're also introducing light mode as a new option for people to choose whether they view the Clipchamp editor in a Light or Dark scheme.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read aloud available in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat
Description: Play back Copilot responses as audio with read aloud in Copilot Chat.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Scan cold files in SharePoint and OneDrive for sensitive information
Description: This new capability will enable admins to scan existing files at rest in SharePoint or OneDrive for Business for sensitive data and classify and/or label them accordingly. This includes files that have never been scanned or scanned in some time.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Sensitivity labels
Description: Viva Amplify will support sending mail with sensitivity.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - General availability of Microsoft partner data connectors for T-Mobile and HKCSL
Description: These connectors will support ingestion for T-Mobile and HKCSL data to user mailboxes and makes them available for compliance.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Wired headset support for the Walkie Talkie app on iOS
Description: This feature adds the wired support to Walkie Talkie on iOS. It adds support for both specialized PTT headsets and generic headsets.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter joins Townhalls via dial-in
Description: Teams Townhall presenters will now have the ability to join their townhalls using dial-in details. These details will be available in the body of the invite email they receive from Teams.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to separate out the Townhall attendee invites
Description: This backend change will now address the 'separation of attendee' invites from the events crew. This feature allows the organizers of Townhalls to maintain separate invites for attendees.

Title: Microsoft Teams: CVI support for Townhall and Webinar presenters
Description: Presenters can now join Teams Townhall and Teams Webinar sessions using third-party video teleconferencing devices (VTC) through Cloud Video Interop (CVI) coordinates provided in presenter invites.  Only trusted CVI devices can join the event and use presenter features like Green Room.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin units support for SharePoint Online
Description: Delegate management and remediation authority for different people in different regions or organization units with role-based access control (RBAC). For example, German investigators should be able to investigate alerts and audit events for only German users. This update extends support to SharePoint for Microsoft 365.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User analytics
Description:
With this feature, insights will be generated for potentially risky behaviors at a user level and will be surfaced across the following experiences:

1) Insider risk management context in DLP alert investigation
2) Insider risk management context in Communication compliance alert investigation
3) Insider risk management context in Microsoft Defender XDR user entity page
4) Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR  

User analytics will cover all eligible users in the tenant including users not in the scope of any Insider risk management policy. Customers can enable/disable user analytics in their tenant from Insider Risk Management settings.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Distribute from SharePoint
Description: We are bringing Amplify capabilities to SharePoint. Soon, you will be able to share your Pages to multiple channels using Amplify without needing to navigate away from SharePoint. You will receive the in-depth Amplify reporting on these pages.

Title: Microsoft Teams: ‘Add emoji’ updated keyboard shortcut
Description: Insert emojis directly from your keyboard without any distractions. Use colons (e.g. :smile:) in the compose box to add any emoji, even your custom ones, making it quicker to express yourself.

Title: Microsoft Intune: Support for Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (MDE) attach for synthetic devices for GCC and GCCH environments
Description: This provides simplified onboarding changes to MDE attach functionality through integration with Intune and Defender.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Dictate your prompts in Copilot Chat
Description: Use the dictation button to input your prompts with speech.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- DLP alerts as indicators
Description:
IRM admins can now select DLP alerts as indicators in IRM policies. IRM admins can select DLP policies that they would like to bring into IRM. By enabling this indicator, admins can detect if a user has alerts for the pre-selected DLP policies. When an IRM alert is generated, admin can see if there are any high-risk alerts for this user within DLP for the policies that are enabled as indicators. This feature will help admins view this information within IRM itself without having to switch to DLP.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python for Mac
Description: Using everyday language, ask Copilot to perform advanced analytics that would usually take you hours or is beyond your skillset like machine learning, predictive forecasting, and more. Copilot will write Python code for you and insert it on the grid, resulting in deeper insights and stunning visuals. Available on Excel for Mac in English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish, with additional languages coming soon.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Classification improvements on file read access in MacOS devices using Endpoint Data Loss Prevention
Description: Data classification on files in MacOS devices will be triggered when handling files on read access to improve classification operations.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - MacOS parity for full file evidence
Description: Data Loss Prevention can copy the item that matches a DLP policy from onboarded MacOS devices to an Azure storage account. This creates full file evidence parity for MacOS.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Paste to Browser prevention support on macOS device with endpoint DLP
Description: Microsoft Purview Endpoint Data Loss Prevention adds support for instances where users try to paste sensitive content into a web browser on macOS devices using Edge, Safari, and other browsers.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Fabric risk indicators in Insider Risk Management
Description:
With this update, Insider Risk Management extends its risk detection capabilities to Microsoft Fabric products by offering ready-to-use risk indicators based on activities that may lead to a data security incident in Power BI. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Support for multicloud environments
Description:
Insider Risk Management extends its detection into multicloud environments by offering ready-to-use risk indicators in Azure, AWS, and SaaS apps including Box, Dropbox, Google Drive, and GitHub. Organizations can use these new indicators in data theft and data leaks policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Post and reply to questions as an organizer
Description: Town hall, webinar, and meeting organizers can now post and reply to questions using the title “organizer” in the Q&A experience, instead of their individual names. This feature allows instance organizers to present a unified and official voice when responding to attendee questions.

Title: Planner: Smart backgrounds for basic plans
Description: Get ready to customize your plans like never before! With smart backgrounds, you’ll be able to quickly spot the right plans. This feature was part of our legacy Planner experience, and we’re now enabling it for basic plans in the new Planner.

Title: SharePoint: Preview for Pages and News
Description: This creates Preview mode for authors to view how their Pages and News will look across different device types while editing.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for touch phones
Description:
This roadmap was updated to launched by mistake. We apologize the inconvenience. 
This feature allows you to configure custom contacts and speed dial on the line key of touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. It enables you to swiftly access frequently dialed numbers and contacts, incorporating one-touch/press dialing and effortless management of contact lists on touch devices.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Adding and editing external contacts
Description: With this feature, users will now be able to add and edit external contacts from Teams phone devices.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Refreshed Engage Communities app in Teams mobile
Description: New, mobile-first experience to participate in communities aligned to personal interests and job functions.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Native Bluetooth call controls over Hands-Free Protocol for multiple peripheral devices
Description: When you have several peripheral devices connected to Teams, the one you use to answer a call will temporarily become the main device that will be syncing with Teams when using its buttons. After the call, the original device selected in Teams settings will take over again. You can now use multiple native Bluetooth devices and be confident that call controls will function correctly with all of them.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Webinars in DoD
Description: Teams Webinars are now available for the DoD community. DoD users can now schedule webinar instances with internal audiences, and leverage capabilities such as creation of an event page, attendee registration, automated emails, and more.

Title: SharePoint: Syntex Optical Character Recognition (OCR) extends support for Microsoft Office files
Description: SharePoint OCR feature now extends support to Microsoft Office files. Previously, OCR was limited to PDFs and images but with this update, you can seamlessly extract and utilize text from any embedded images within any Microsoft Office files like Word, PowerPoint, and Excel.

Title: Outlook: Delegates can now create new categories for the account owner's Calendar
Description: Delegates can now create new categories on behalf of the person who granted them permissions. They can also apply said categories to the Calendar of that same person who granted them permissions. Delegates can view the list of the delegator's Categories by visiting the Accounts > Categories page of the Settings window and selecting the delegator's account from the dropdown. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
Description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Department graph for Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI
Description: A new graph added to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI displays the departments of users interacting with M365 Copilot.

Title: Outlook: Summarize email attachments with Copilot
Description: You will now be able to summarize PDF, Word, and PowerPoint email attachments with Copilot in Outlook. The new feature will be available for Outlook Web, the new Outlook for Windows, Outlook Mobile, and the new Outlook for Mac. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Planner: Status report emails with Project Manager Agent
Description: A new feature in the Project Manager Agent automates the creation of status report emails for your plans. This capability streamlines project updates by generating concise, accurate, and professional email summaries based on your plan's progress, key milestones, and upcoming tasks. With this feature, you can ensure stakeholders stay informed effortlessly, saving time while maintaining transparency and alignment across your projects.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents to run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams
Description: We mistakenly marked the roadmap as "launched." The correct status is In Development. We apologize the inconvenience. Developers can create, test and update custom engine agents using Teams Toolkit & Microsoft Copilot Studio, so that they can run in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams meetings for GCC
Description: Copilot helps you run more effective meetings, get up to speed on the conversation, organize key discussion points, and summarize key actions so it’s clear what you need to do next. Users can type any question or use predetermined prompts during or after the meeting, and their interactions with Copilot are only visible to them. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Quick sharing of files in Teams
Description: Share a file from a chat conversation, Shared tab or a channel post to 1:1 chats, group chats, or channels with fewer clicks. When files are shared, their permissions are maintained, ensuring that recipients have the appropriate access rights. You can add additional information to your message and @mention recipients for greater clarity and alignment.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use Kiota as an API plugin generation tool
Description: Developers using Teams Toolkit and Kiota can use them together as an API plugin generation tool. This unlocks new scenarios like searching our repository of public APIs, visually selecting the main integration endpoints and improving the maintainability of existing plugins by using a workspace file and allowing full regeneration of plugin files.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Discover all prompt collections in the new Copilot Prompt Gallery app within Microsoft 365
Description: The new Copilot Prompt Gallery app provides a central place to find, save, and share prompts available from Microsoft 365 Copilot apps and agents. You can also explore and use a curated selection of suggested prompts organized by role, function, or industry. This app will be available on Teams, Outlook and www.microsoft365.com.

Title: Windows 365: Resize is enabled for Windows 365 Frontline Cloud PCs
Description: When changing the Cloud PC size on a specific assignment within the provisioning policy for W365 Frontline, all of the Cloud PCs in that assignment will be resized to the newly selected Cloud PC size.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python Language Expansion for Windows
Description: Using everyday language, ask Copilot to perform advanced analytics that would usually take you hours or is beyond your skillset like machine learning, predictive forecasting, and more. Copilot will write Python code for you and insert it on the grid, resulting in deeper insights and stunning visuals. Available on Excel for Windows in English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish, with additional languages coming soon.

Title: Excel: Python in Excel for GCC
Description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature, users with access to Excel for Windows will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Extensibility -  Automatic project scaffolding in Teams Toolkit for building Graph connectors
Description: Developers can now leverage an automatic project scaffolding for Graph connector applications within the Teams Toolkit, allowing for the generation of a full production-ready Graph connector application from just an API description file, significantly reducing setup time and complexity.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can build custom engine agents with the Microsoft 365 Agents SDK
Description: Developers can use the Microsoft 365 Agents SDK to create custom engine agents. These agents, built on their own AI stack, can be deployed to various platforms, including Microsoft 365 Copilot, Microsoft Teams, and other non-Microsoft channels.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Analytics available in Microsoft 365 Copilot
Description: Copilot Analytics is designed to empower every IT and business leader to measure adoption and business impact of Copilot and agents with out-of-the-box experiences in Copilot Dashboard and customizable reporting for deeper analysis against your KPIs. With Viva Insights included, IT admins and analysts can now tailor advanced prebuilt Copilot reports with their business data or create custom reports with organizational attributes, longer usage data sets, and more granular controls.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Copilot Chat developer mode
Description: Developers can use Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat and enable developer mode to debug.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot extensibility – Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience
Description: Developers can use TypeSpec as an authoring experience for declarative agents and API plugins in Teams Toolkit.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention- OCR Cost Estimator Support for MAC Endpoints
Description: OCR Cost Estimator allows you to estimate the potential cost for using Optical Character Recognition. This means that you will no longer be required to set up an Azure Subscription for billing first and can accurately estimate the cost you would have incurred while using OCR. This will help you to identify the optimal configuration settings for OCR as per your requirements. Cost Estimator can be used for 30 days and will not scan images for sensitive content.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Community replies and reactions in Teams
Description: Users with the Viva Engage app in Teams will now receive notifications when others reply or react to their posts.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies in Exchange
Description: The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail

Title: Windows 365: Concurrency assignment for Windows 365 Frontline in dedicated mode
Description: Concurrency assignment in Windows 365 Frontline in dedicated mode refers to the number of active Cloud PCs that can be used simultaneously within the total number of licensed Cloud PC usage for Frontline. This allocation ensures that resources are optimized based on the specific needs of the organization and its users.

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: New Feature access management UI in Admin Center
Description: Through the new Feature Access management user interface, admins will be able to manage feature access settings directly in Microsoft 365 admin center. Feature access management allows admins to use access policies to manage which users can access specific features in Viva apps, so you can tailor your deployments to meet your local regulatory or business requirements. Previously, these policies could only be managed with Microsoft PowerShell cmdlets. After this rollout, admins can choose to use either Microsoft 365 admin center or PowerShell to manage feature access. Existing policies set for an organization will persist and can be managed in both places.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Ad-hoc individual desk booking in Teams
Description: In addition to being able to book a desk in advance through Outlook, now you can instantly reserve an individual desk when plugging into a peripheral on a shared desk. IT admins can also get valuable desk utilization data in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal making flexible work environments better for users and IT. This feature requires a Teams premium license.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft Purview Endpoint DLP blanket protections for unscannable file types
Description: Purview Endpoint DLP supports a set of specific file extensions and types. For file extensions not listed in this document, customers must use the 'File extension is' or 'File type is' rule condition. However, this approach can be challenging, as it requires manually enumerate all desired file extensions. This feature will enable protection for files outside the standard Purview Endpoint DLP monitoring scope.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python for Web
Description: Using everyday language, ask Copilot to perform advanced analytics that would usually take you hours or is beyond your skillset like machine learning, predictive forecasting, and more. Copilot will write Python code for you and insert it on the grid, resulting in deeper insights and stunning visuals. Available on Excel for the Web in English, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Brazilian Portuguese, and Spanish, with additional languages coming soon.

Title: SharePoint: Modifications in the Embedded container type creation cmdlets in PowerShell
Description: We’re introducing modifications in the container type creation cmdlets. The New-SPOContainerType cmdlet will only create a new container type. We are introducing the Add-SPOContainerTypeBilling cmdlet to add billing profile to the new container type.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Occupancy status on Teams panels
Description: Teams panels can now smartly utilize signals from Teams Rooms devices or occupancy sensors paired with panels to indicate when a room is in use (e.g. LED glow), so you’re not surprised to find an available room is actually occupied.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New Insider Risk Management reporting capabilities
Description:
Insider risk management is introducing one central location for all reports including analytics and user activity reports. Additional reports will also be available that will summarize trends in alerts generated and cases created. Sample reports include alerts generated over time, alerts actioned over time, alerts and cases generated by region and department, top triggering events of alerts generated, and average time to triage alerts and cases.

The ability to filter reports will also be introduced. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Bookings: ''Cc" functionality to email notifications
Description: "CC" additional email addresses on confirmation & reminder emails for 1:1 & N:1 appointments.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
Description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: SharePoint: Additional support on SPAC to identify different types of Embedded containers and their principal owner
Description: The update enables SharePoint Embedded Administrators (SPE Admins) to identify the different kind of containers (user, tenant, and group) and the principal owner associated with the container.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Custom agent Power BI report in Viva Insights analyst workbench
Description: Custom agent adoption metrics and insights report in Viva Insights analyst workbench. Scope includes custom agents created in Copilot Studio, insights are aggregated on the agent-level.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting recap can be shared via link
Description: Meeting participants can now share a link to the meeting recap from the meeting thumbnail in chat and the recap tab, making it easier to reference and share the meeting recap insights with others. Meeting participants can share the meeting recap link with anyone in their organization, for those users who don't have access to the recording or transcript, they need to request recording and transcript access before they can access the meeting recap.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting Notes now available in Microsoft Teams for Education
Description: Teams meeting Notes, powered by Loop, is now available in Microsoft Teams for Education. Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.

Title:
Microsoft Teams: Updates to Gallery
View in Teams Rooms on Windows
Description: The updated Gallery View in Teams Rooms on Windows arranges all participants in consistent tile sizes, prioritizes video on the meeting stage, offers additional layout options, optimizes for single and dual displays, and provides a unified meeting experience across both Teams Rooms and desktop.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter Chat while screensharing
Description: Enable presenters to more easily access the meeting chat while screensharing by adding an entry point in the presenter toolbar.

Title: Microsoft Teams: VDI Status Indicator
Description: This feature provides a visual optimization status indicator in Teams for VDI users. It will provide the user with an easy to understand status message (like ‘Optimized', or 'Not Optimized'), some contextual information about the optimization mode (optimized with the WebRTC-based solution or the new SlimCore-based solution), and in the not optimized case it will provide a brief description of the problem and an error code, for better supportability. It will also provide an option to repair Teams optimization mode if the user is not optimized (through a restart).

Title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
Description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Queues app on Teams phone devices
Description: Queues app on Teams phone devices enhances call management capabilities by allowing agents to handle incoming calls, view call queues, and manage call history directly from their Teams phone devices, improving efficiency and ensuring effortless communication for agents.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Block a user for your organization
Description: With the availability of the delete API (removeallaccessforuser API), it does not stop the malicious user from resending the message to the same victim. To help prevent that, a block user API will allow the admin to block the malicious user from reaching out again. To make this even more effective, we will utilize a similar feature as the allow/block list in federation to block the malicious user from the entire organization.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Prompt suggestions in Copilot chat
Description: Get started in Copilot chat quickly with automatic prompt suggestions that enhance your productivity by providing relevant and context-aware prompts based on your previous interactions.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Show/hide discover feed
Description: You will now have the flexibility to show or hide (turn off/turn on) discover feed. Users can access this new toggle from the general settings section.

Title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
Description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
Description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
Description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

Title: Microsoft Teams:  Draggable Presenter Toolbar while screensharing
Description: Introducing the ability for presenters to freely drag Presenter Toolbar appearing on top of screen while screensharing.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint - Improved DLP policy tip reliability
Description: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Windows now consistently show the same policy tips that SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business sites have determined should be shown on a file.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Chat for organizers and presenters in town hall
Description: Organizers, co-organizers, and presenters can chat privately in a separate chat from attendees. This chat is available to access before, during, and after the event.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
Description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
Description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced sound notification controls
Description: You can change the sound of your notifications to help you stay focused, prioritize quickly and avoid distractions. You can as well make urgent notifications and priority contact notifications more prominent. You can also mute notification sounds when you are busy or in a meeting.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Custom emojis and reactions
Description: User can upload their own custom emojis and reactions to personalize their communication. Emojis will be available within the user’s  tenant in chat and channels via the emoji and reaction menus.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams now available for multitenant organizations
