Description: Users can view dynamic, engaging, and relevant content on the Teams Rooms front-of-room display when the device is not in use. Admins can remotely configure tenant-wide and room-specific digital signage settings at scale from Teams Rooms Pro Management. Integrations with selected third-party digital signage providers and content management systems are supported, initial partners are Appspace and XOGO. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro license customers.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for Advanced Insights App
Description: Copilot in Viva Insights simplifies the query-building process for analysts by suggesting metrics, filters, and attributes that are relevant to the analysis.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
Description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in chat
Description: The Files tab in chat is now ‘Shared’. The shared tab shows all the files and links that were sent in the chat, making it easier to find them- all in one place. Channels are not affected by this change.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Cloud Policy service audit logs for policy changes
Description: Activities performed by administrators within the Cloud Policy service, like editing a policy configuration, will generate Audit logs stored in Purview Audit and will be accessible by Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users.

Title: Outlook: Entry point change - apps when reading emails moved to the ribbon
Description: The Apps flyout and entry point for pinned apps will be moved to the Home tab in the Ribbon in the New Outlook and Outlook for Web. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Town Halls
Description: This feature allows the organizers of town halls to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to block Attendee Emails from Teams Webinars
Description: This feature allows the organizers of webinars to block the sending of attendee emails from Microsoft Teams.

Title: Microsoft To Do: Microsoft To Do availability in Outlook on the web
Description: Microsoft To Do will be available from the Outlook on the web app launcher. To Do will replace the tasks module currently available. After this change, you will see To Do in the app launcher instead of tasks.

Title: Bookings: SMS Notifications for Staff scheduled appointments in Bookings (Premium)
Description: If you have a Microsoft Teams Premium license you can now set up SMS text notifications in Microsoft Bookings to be sent to the person booking an appointment. Currently, SMS notifications will be sent only when appointments are scheduled by an attendee via a published booking page. With this update, the capability is extended to include sending SMS confirmations and reminders to the attendee when appointments are booked through the calendar scheduling experience in Bookings by a scheduler or a staff member.

Title: Outlook: Teams chat from email messages in the new Outlook for Windows
Description: This will allow users to start a Teams chat directly from an email message with the sender or all of the recipients in the email, the Teams chat opens in Outlook - so users can chat and continue their workflow in Outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Teams: See multiple participants and shared content preview in improved presenter window when screen sharing
Description: When sharing the screen or content, the presenter will now be able to better keep track of the participants' activity during a meeting. The Improved Presenter Window shows up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), who are active speakers and who raised hands, as well as a preview of the content being shared. Meeting notifications appear in the middle of the screen for better visibility.  This gives presenters increased confidence and awareness of what is happening among participants during a meeting.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
Description: When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
Description: When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

Title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the Classic Outlook for Windows
Description: We are updating the tittle and description to highlight that this feature is coming to the Classic Outlook for Windows, we apologize for the inconvenience it might have caused. Use the To Do app without leaving the Classic Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses
Description: Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses hosted at SuccessFactors can be displayed at Viva Learning.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Viva App Bar integration in Viva Learning Webapp
Description: Viva Learning Webapp will have an easy way to switch across other Viva Webapp modules.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal : Insider Risk Management – Real-time policy tuning analysis
Description: Policy tuning analysis provides admins with a real-time prediction based on the number of users that could match a given set of policy conditions. It helps organizations efficiently adjust the selection of indicators and thresholds of activity occurrence, so they don’t have too few or too many alerts from a policy. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Outlook: Reset People Suggestions in Search
Description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows settings. If a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. Note: The release month and status have been updated to show current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Title: Outlook: open attachments while offline in the new Outlook for Windows
Description: We are adding more functionality to offline mode in the new Outlook for Windows. You will now be able to open and save attachments from your email without an internet connection. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft 365: Updated settings for the Microsoft 365 app on Windows
Description: The Microsoft 365 app on Windows added settings to pin the app to the taskbar.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Read Aloud support added to Copilot chat responses
Description: Read Aloud capability lets you listen to Copilot responses in the chat pane.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Delayed simultaneous ring setting
Description: For teams with shared call responsibilities, delayed simultaneous ring will ensure calls configure the intended recipient first, instead of notifying everyone the moment a call comes in.  This helps reduce noise and minimizes distractions —especially for roles like delegates and customer service teams.

Title: Outlook: Optional connected experiences privacy setting
Description: This rollout introduces the privacy setting for "Turn on optional connected experiences" in Outlook on the web which is available in other Office apps today. The setting is found under Settings > General > Privacy and data > Privacy settings.

Title: OneNote: Copilot Pages in OneNote
Description: Access Copilot pages inside OneNote, along with all of your notes.

Title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Iphone)
Description: With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.

Title: OneNote: Summary and Q&A in OneNote Mobile with Copilot (Android)
Description: With this new Summary feature in OneNote mobile, you can create a short and fluent summary of your longer pages which will help to consume relevant information faster. With the Question and Answer at your fingertips, you can get real-time answers to your queries directly within your notes, enhancing your ability to access and utilize information quickly and effectively.

Title: OneNote: Copilot on OneNote brings in notes from Video and Images (Android)
Description: With this new feature in OneNote mobile, you can share videos and images into OneNote and watch the magic unfold. All the key insights from the video and images are captured effortlessly into notes so that you do not have to manually create them.

Title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (Android)
Description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

Title: OneNote: Boost productivity using voice with Copilot on OneNote Mobile (iPhone)
Description: Copilot in OneNote transforms fragmented voice thoughts and conversation recordings into clear, actionable insights. It enhances productivity by accurately capturing and organizing verbal notes, filling in gaps, and providing structured summaries, making it easier to review and utilize information effectively.  Exciting News! Copilot in OneNote can now access and understand verbal notes, synthesize conversations, and transform fragmented thoughts into clear, actionable insights, boosting productivity.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Improved template support when you create a presentation with Copilot
Description: Once you update your template(s) to PowerPoint's best practices, your templates will work even better with Copilot. You'll get beautiful on-brand slides every time you open your optimized template and create a presentation with Copilot.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Shared call history for call delegation on Teams phone devices
Description: Call delegators and their delegates can now view shared call history records for the shared line directly on their Teams phone devices. This enhancement promotes greater transparency and collaboration. All delegates associated with a user will be able to monitor incoming and outgoing calls for the shared line, irrespective of their participation in the call.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC general availability
Description: Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC, your AI assistant for work in the GCC environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is available in Teams (Chat and Channel) excluding Compose, Outlook (includes mobile), Word, PowerPoint, and Excel as well as other surfaces, including microsoft365.com.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Setup wizard UX improvements for Workday integration
Description: The Workday setup wizard will be modular and more intuitive going forward.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sync provider data from a specific date range
Description: We are introducing flexibility on provider setup form where admins can sync data from specific dates for a provider instead of full data sync.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Manual sync trigger options for provider data
Description: Customers can manually trigger sync for different data types on Manage providers in Viva Learning admin page.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Deploy frontline teams with flexible membership
Description: With our Deploy Teams at Scale tool on the Teams Admin Center, you can deploy location-based frontline teams where team membership is automatically managed alongside any manual changes made by your team owners.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Verified Answers
Description: Certain users like experts and admins will be able to mark answers to questions as verified answers to signal a credible and accurate answer. Questions with verified answers will receive its own special verified label and badge at the top of the question and on the verified answer. The goal of verified answers is to help enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in Viva Engage.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Designated experts in communities
Description: We are introducing the Community Expert in Viva Engage to enhance the trust and utility of knowledge in your communities. Experts will be able to endorse accurate and credible answers and be recognized as community experts with a special label next to their name.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enhanced alert and user investigation using Copilot for Security in Insider Risk Management
Description: When investigating alerts within Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management, you can now harness the power of Microsoft Copilot for Security. This tool not only provides concise alert summaries, but it also allows you to delve into specific user activities. By doing so, you can promptly assess whether the user associated with the alert warrants further investigation or if the alert can be safely dismissed. Additionally, with just a click, you can obtain a succinct summary of the user’s risk profile, highlighting crucial details and top risk factors. Leveraging Copilot for Security streamlines investigations, ultimately reducing the triage workload and enabling faster decision making.

Title: Outlook: Replace quick compose pop-up with inline appointment creation in new Outlook for Windows and web
Description: When single clicking on an empty time slot on the calendar surface, the quick compose pop-up will no longer be shown - instead, you will be able to create an appointment by typing directly in the time slot on the calendar grid, just as you can in classic Outlook for Windows. There will be no change to double click behavior, the full compose form will still open as it does today. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
Description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
Description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

Title: Word: Get started on a draft immediately with example prompts
Description: On blank documents, Copilot in Word will provide one-click examples of prompts that quickly help you get going on your document.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Longer documents can be summarized in chat
Description: Copilot in Word will be able to completely summarize documents that it could only partially summarize before. The upper limit is increasing to about four times more words.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot for PowerPoint will help you build your story's narrative
Description: Steer your narrative with Copilot when creating a PowerPoint presentation.

Title: Word: Automatic summary of documents on file-open in Word
Description: When you open a document, Copilot will generate a summary in the Word window. You can hide the summary or open the Copilot chat pane to ask specific questions about the document.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
Description: Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.

Title: Microsoft Excel: Extending support for Insights Services to GCC sovereign cloud
Description: GCC sovereign cloud customers will be able to use features in Excel run by Insights Services, including Analyze Data found on the Home tab.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy support for additional external content
Description: This feature includes the ability to support external content including Copilot Lab resources

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
Description: The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
Description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
Description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Webinars in GCC-High
Description: Teams Webinars is available for GCC-High clouds. This includes similar functionality that is already available for worldwide multi-tenant, such as interactivity for up to 1,000 attendees, registration support,  co-organizer support, breakout rooms, attendee reporting, and Dynamics 365 marketing integration.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Referenced sources are cited in drafted content
Description: When drafting content that's based on referenced sources, Copilot includes citations in the text it generates, indicating references to information in the content.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
Description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document rather than operating on the entire document.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
Description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Date and numeral standardization
Description: All the dates that appear in Viva Learning will match the layout local to the user. This also applies to standardization of numerals.

Title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
Description: Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with themes
Description: Site owners will now be able to customize their sites and experiences with branded themes. Site owners will create themes using the Site branding feature or will use branding from the organization if there is a brand center set up.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to rename the policy and rule names in DLP
Description: This feature gives the ability for the DLP admin to rename the existing policy/rule without having to create the entire the rule or policy again.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Retention based on Last Accessed for files in OneDrive and SharePoint
Description: This creates the ability to apply Retention to each SharePoint or OneDrive item based on when it was last accessed by a user.

Title: Microsoft Information Protection: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
Description: Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Separation of the Copilot for Microsoft 365 retention policy location from Microsoft Teams chats
Description: Today, admins must manage retention and deletion for Copilot for Microsoft 365 interactions using a retention policy location that also includes Microsoft Teams chats. This feature will provide a new location option to manage only Copilot for Microsoft interactions, separate from Microsoft Teams chats.

Title: Microsoft Viva: End user cards in Viva Connections
Description: Employees can now create their own cards that connect to other tools and destinations on Connections dashboard.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
Description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated welcome screen for the Microsoft 365 app on Windows
Description: The Microsoft 365 app welcome screen on Windows will be updated to display a welcome message and progress bar while the Microsoft 365 app loads.

Title: Microsoft Viva: New card for Viva Engage conversations in Viva Connections dashboard
Description: We're excited to announce a new integration between Viva Engage and Viva Connections—an Engage feed card in the Connections dashboard. Users will be able to view and interact with their Viva Engage feed conversations directly in Viva Connections through a new card in the dashboard. This is possible when the admins/operators add the Engage card into their tenant Viva Connections dashboard. Users can then click on the card to engage with their Viva Engage feed conversations directly in Viva Connections without being redirected out of the app.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer
Description: Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Together Mode New Flow
Description:
After further review, this feature continues rolling out. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Together mode will get a new simplified flow which will take the user from the beginning to the end through the steps of setting up the scene, assigning the seats and applying for everyone in the call in a transparent and easy-to-understand way. The function itself does not change but there will be more transparency thanks to the icons on the meeting toolbar for an easy access for each next step in the familiar Together mode flow.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Forwarding loop components
Description: You can now forward chat messages containing Loop components, allowing for seamless sharing and real-time collaboration across different chats. To forward a message, navigate to it, click on the ellipsis, and select ‘Forward’ from the menu.

Title: Outlook: "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
Description: We’ve introduced a new "None" color category for Mail and Calendar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This update provides more flexibility and customization in categorizing your emails and calendar events. By selecting the "None" option, users can now choose to have items without a designated color, allowing for cleaner organization and more control over which items stand out visually. Updated February 6, 2025: This item was changed to "Launched" by mistake. The correct status is currently "Rolling out." #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot with enterprise data protection prompt metric
Description: A new metric counting the prompts submitted through Business Chat (web) or Copilot with enterprise data protection metric will be added to Viva Insights advanced insights and Copilot dashboard.

Title: Outlook: Insert signature into calendar events
Description: Users can manually insert a signature into a calendar event like they can in the classic outlook. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Teams: Filter between active and archived teams in Shifts app schedules
Description: Coming soon for the Shifts app in Microsoft Teams: An enhanced All schedules view with a new dropdown filter, enabling you to easily switch between active and archived teams. This feature helps reduce clutter, allowing managers and frontline workers to concentrate on the schedules of active teams.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Data Security Analytics
Description:
Data Security analytics will serve as a launchpad for administrators, enabling them to swiftly navigate day-to-day tasks. It will provide a comprehensive overview of an organization’s sensitive data landscape, visibility into potential risks, and offer contextual recommendations to strengthen the organization's data security posture. The Data Security Copilot will serve as an intelligent AI assistant layered on top of data security analytics, supporting tasks related to administration, risk assessment, alert triage, and reporting. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Message/Attachment contains EXO predicates
Description: Introducing two new DLP Exchange predicates: "Message contains" and "Attachment contains" with a focus on DLP evaluation on only specific email components like email body or attachments. Unlike the broader "Content contains" predicate that evaluated entire email envelope, these enable targeted DLP evaluation on specific email components.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Email verification for external attendees to join Teams meetings
Description: Meeting organizers can have greater confidence about external attendees joining Teams meetings, this capability enables sending a one-time passcode to the external attendee’s email address for that individual to use during a verification step when joining a Teams meeting.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Customer Facing Reports via Insights Integration
Description: Org level breakdown of Learning metrics in Viva Insights.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Mute conversations
Description: Corporate communicators, network admins, and Engage admins can remove chosen conversation threads from the Engage Home Feed, storylines feed, and email digests. Conversations continue to show in community feeds, user profiles, and search. Muting a conversation does not affect notifications.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot inference and evaluation policy for Copilot in Teams meetings
Description: This policy enables IT admins to block Copilot responses that might infer emotions, make evaluations, discuss personal traits, and use context to deduce answers. When this setting is applied it restricts copilot’s ability to make inferences or evaluations about people or groups when prompted to do so by users. Users cannot disable this setting. The setting applies to Copilot in Teams meetings.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Preview and "Apply" changes suggested by Copilot
Description: Previously, when a user asked Copilot to make changes to their table data, Copilot would make the changes directly. Now, Copilot will respond with a description of the planned changes, along with a button to "Apply". Users can choose to refine before applying. This provides more user awareness and control over Copilot's changes.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Showing aggregate Likes on prompts
Description: See the amount of likes for prompts in your organization in Copilot Prompt Gallery.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Prompt Gallery - Share a prompt with a co-worker
Description: Easily create, save, and share your favorite prompts using Copilot Prompt Gallery, inspiring your co-workers to achieve more with Copilot.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
Description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Loop available in Loop components in Teams and Outlook
Description: People with a Copilot License can now leverage Copilot in Loop when they paste Loop components into the Teams app, Outlook, and Meeting Notes.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Enhancements to the DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints
Description: Mac DLP will have the following capabilities with these enhancements: Context Based Classification and Matched condition and short evidence for advanced classification.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Current web content included when drafting with Copilot in Word
Description: Draft with Copilot will include information from Bing search, resulting in content that's as current as what you would find when searching with Bing on the web.

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Use sensitivity labels in Microsoft 365 apps when connected experiences are disabled
Description: Your organization can now disable connected experiences for privacy concerns without impacting data security policies, such as sensitivity labels. Services associated with Microsoft Purview (e.g. sensitivity labels and rights management) are no longer controlled by policy settings to manage privacy controls for Microsoft 365 Apps. Instead, these services will rely on their existing security admin controls in Purview portals.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot in Viva Learning
Description: Copilot in Viva Learning will act as a virtual learning companion, assisting users throughout their learning journey and providing personalized guidance, recommendations, and the ability to take actions. Users will be able to leverage Copilot to preview and consume courses from Copilot’s search results, create learning collections in a single click, and see highly relevant search results by asking questions in natural language. Copilot will be visible to users on the Home page, My Learning tab, course details pages, and on Academies.

Title: Excel: Comment filtering
Description: Enable filtering capabilities for the comment pane.

Title: Visio: Infinite Canvas in Visio for the web
Description: Infinite canvas in Visio for the web is an expansive digital canvas designed to remove spatial limitations. It will allow users to stretch their creative boundaries by providing the room they need to capture, organize, and visualize ideas without constraints.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Bulk export of learner completion records
Description: Learner Completion Record bulk export is an extension of an existing feature to download Learner record by username. Bulk export empowers enterprises to download learner records of multiple users in one go using the M365 groups.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Admin Units support for DLP alerts in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
Description: With this capability we are extending the Admin Units capability currently available in Microsoft Purview Information Protection and Data Loss Prevention (DLP) to DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Proficiency level content filter
Description: Users can filter content based on the proficiency level of the content—Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Spell check in Viva Learning search
Description: User queries will be spell checked and corrected for all in-app Search. 2/12/2025: This roadmap item was changed inadvertently to Launched. The correct status is Rolling out. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Sort search results by ratings
Description: Users can sort in-app search results by ratings and relevance of the content.

Title: Microsoft Forms: Migrate Google Forms through the M365 Admin Center
Description: Support Google Forms to Microsoft Forms migration via M365 admin center. Note: The current release phase has been updated to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Enhanced User Settings experience in Viva Engage
Description: Modernized user experience for leveraging general and notification settings within Viva Engage

Title: Outlook: Message recall in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
Description: From the Outlook for iOS and Android apps, you can request Outlook to attempt to recall a message sent to a colleague within your organization

Title: Outlook: Easily start a new email from document previewer in the Outlook app for Android
Description: From the document previewer, there will now be an option to start a new mail with the document being viewed added to that new email

Title: Outlook: Choose save location when saving to a cloud account in the Outlook app for iOS and Android
Description: When you save a document to a cloud account, you will be able to browse through the folders of that account to find the place you would like to save your file.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - New email scoring capabilities
Description:
Insider risk management (IRM) email scoring logic is being updated. With current logic, a single email to multiple recipients (say “n”) is counted multiple times (n times), and this is creating noise by increasing the risk score. In the new logic, a single email to multiple recipients is counted once, and this new principle is applicable to the email containing multiple unallowed domains or priority content. Once this is rolled out, all the email insights in alerts will display the new count and score.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
Description: Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create the perfect banner for your document with Copilot and Designer
Description: Chat with Copilot in Word, and let Designer help your document stand out by producing eye-catching visuals that fill the width of the page.

Title: OneDrive: Ask Copilot questions about images
Description: Now, you can ask questions about images stored in your OneDrive. Select up to 5 images and ask questions like explaining the contents of an image or extracting relevant text from an image. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

Title: Microsoft Intune: New enrollment policies experience for iOS/iPadOS ADE
Description: These enrollment policies for iOS/iPadOS contains enrollment time grouping, improved UI, and removes automatic deployment of the Company Portal app and deprecated settings.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
Description: Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (customer managed storage)
Description: In the alerts triage and incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

Title: Outlook: Optimized hover actions in the message list on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
Description: The hover actions in the message list will be modified to be more space efficient and minimize unnecessary mouse travel. This change primarily affects users with the multicolumn (wider) message list. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Edge: v.136 - Authorized Group Setting in Microsoft Edge for Business
Description: The authorized group setting ensures that Edge respects the settings for "Printer groups," "Removable USB device groups," and "Network share groups" in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. This change will prevent users from bypassing Data Loss Prevention (DLP) protections by using Edge, thereby enhancing security and compliance.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
Description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
Description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromised user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. 

Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections.
1. Sign in risk detections: compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in.
2. User risk detections: compromise risk associated with a specific user.

Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

Title: SharePoint: Updates for font management capabilities
Description: We are introducing updates that provide capabilities for managing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections. This includes the ability to hide the From Microsoft font packages from Change the look, apply a font package in your site templates, and updated availability for the From Microsoft font packages.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Charts, Graphs and Data Analysis in Copilot for Microsoft 365
Description: Use prompts to create charts, graphs, and data analysis in Business Chat.

Title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy tips revamp for New Outlook
Description: Introducing new and improved DLP Policy tips in New Outlook for all E5 users. New DLP will support top DLP predicates and exceptions, all advanced classifiers, and override capabilities for E5 users. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background for GCC and GCC High environments (Premium)
Description: Decorate your background is now available to customers in the GCC and GCC High environments. Decorate your background is a generative background effect in Teams that makes meetings more fun and personal by using AI to spruce up your meeting background. Blend your physical and digital spaces, enabling you to revamp what’s seen of your physical meeting space for each call. This technology allows for effortless room clean-ups, adding virtual plants, or festive decorations for special events. Decorate your background requires a Teams Premium license.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - New Copilot adoption metrics and completing total actions taken
Description: This adds seven new Copilot adoption metrics to the Copilot dashboard and Viva Insights Advanced insights. It also updates the "total actions taken" metric in the Copilot dashboard to include these new Copilot adoption metrics.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
Description: Enables survey creators to associate custom questions with Glint standard questions to leverage benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. This customization ensures that survey creators can tailor Glint standard questions to their specific needs while gaining valuable insights from benchmark data.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
Description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes and Loop Components for Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD
Description: Teams Notes and Loop components are now available in Microsoft 365 GCC High and DoD environments, enabling real-time collaboration in chats and meetings. Loop components allow users to co-author tables, action items, and lists directly in chats, while Collaborative Notes let meeting attendees co-create and collaborate on their meeting agendas, notes, and action items. As Loop components, these features stay up-to-date across all shared locations, and assigned tasks automatically sync with Microsoft To Do and Planner for seamless task management.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Teams menu bar icon with Presence on Mac
Description: Introduction of a Menu Bar icon with a flyout for common workflows that reduces clicks and simplifies checking for at-a-glance information like the presence status.

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Microsoft 365 Copilot Usage report - Business Chat
Description: The Microsoft 365 Copilot usage report in the Microsoft 365 admin center will be updated to include usage of Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat (web) along with the existing usage data for Business Chat (work). It will also include enabled users and active users adoption information for new entry points Edge and Microsoft 365 App for Microsoft 365 Copilot.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Net Promoter Score survey on Teams Rooms on Android
Description: Users can rate how likely they are to recommend Microsoft Teams Rooms from 1 to 5 as well as provide additional comments on Teams Rooms on Android devices.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation on MacOS
Description: With voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. Voice isolation is an AI based advanced noise suppression feature that eliminates unwanted background noise including other human voices. The technology recognizes your voice profile and ensures only your voice is transmitted. Voice isolation can be enabled for calls and meetings and will now be available on MacOS.

Title: Microsoft 365: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing
Description: Multi-Geo In-Region Routing (IRR) enables customers to control the routing of inbound emails to comply with regional data regulations. Using IRR, customers can set the geo-region that inbound mail should be routed to for specific Accepted Domains. By setting Accepted Domains to specific geo-regions and then adding users to that Accepted Domain that are located in the same geo-region as the Accepted Domain is set to route mail to, IRR ensures that emails are fully processed and stored in the user's region. This keeps data within the user’s Preferred Data Location (PDL), enhancing data sovereignty and compliance.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Amplify - Copy a publication within a campaign
Description: Gone are the days where you must rewrite or manually copy and paste content from an old publication to a newly drafted one to reuse it. Soon in Viva Amplify, you will be able to copy a publication within an existing campaign with just a few clicks. This new feature streamlines the content creation process, enabling communicators to easily reuse existing content across SharePoint, Outlook, and Teams, including all channel-specific customizations and related audiences, saving you time and effort.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Admins enabled to make bulk employee ID updates
Description: This feature will enable Viva Glint service admins to make bulk employee ID updates in the web app.

Title: Microsoft Viva: List-based Forms card for Viva Connections Dashboard
Description: This feature will allow operators to add a card for any form/survey created for data collection on the Viva Connections Dashboard for attention and quick action.

Title: Outlook: Pin favorites at the top in the New Outlook for Windows and Web
Description: Easily access your most-used folders by pinning them at the top of your Left Nav Bar in the New Outlook for Windows and Web. This feature streamlines navigation, ensuring your important folders are always within reach. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: OneNote: OneNote Copilot on Mac
Description: OneNote Copilot on Mac is your intelligent assistant, transforming the way you interact with your notes. With simple natural language commands, Copilot helps you understand, summarize, and rewrite notes for enhanced clarity and purpose. It’s designed to work seamlessly on the Mac, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on Mac is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
Description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

Title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for iPad
Description: OneNote Copilot on iPad is your intelligent assistant, transforming the way you interact with your notes. With simple natural language commands, Copilot helps you understand, summarize, and rewrite notes for enhanced clarity and purpose. It’s designed to work seamlessly on the iPad, offering a contextual chat experience that allows you to accomplish tasks faster than ever. Whether you’re preparing for a meeting or organizing your thoughts, OneNote Copilot on iPad is the perfect partner for boosting productivity and creativity on the go.

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
Description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bring the latest from your organization into your Word chats with Microsoft Copilot Graph-grounded search
Description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the rich, people-centric data and insights in the Microsoft cloud. That's the power of Copilot and Microsoft Graph.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
Description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bring the latest from your organization into your Word chats with Microsoft Copilot Graph-grounded search
Description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the rich, people-centric data and insights in the Microsoft cloud. That's the power of Copilot and Microsoft Graph.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
Description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

Title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
Description: Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.

Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Relevance recommendation for Message Center posts
Description: The new relevance recommendation in Message Center will help you determine how relevant a change is to your tenant. The recommendation (high, medium, or low) will be determined based on multiple factors, such as service usage and the type of change.

Title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
Description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
Description: This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle separate retention policies for Copilots and AI Apps
Description: Enable admins to configure retention policies for various Copilots and AI Apps.

Title: Outlook: Notifications pane batching
Description: Batches are groups of cards in the user's Notification pane separated by subject. Items from the same email thread, document, sheet, etc. will be grouped into a single batch. #newouotlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
Description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Quick Summarization in eDiscovery
Description: Introducing the Quick Summarization feature for eDiscovery, an embedded Security Copilot skill in Purview, designed to streamline case management with an intuitive, at-a-glance overview. This new capability allows users to quickly access a comprehensive summary of eDiscovery cases, holds, and searches, eliminating the need to navigate through multiple tabs to assess status, statistics of completed actions, pending tasks, and ongoing jobs. The Quick Summarization feature consolidates this information into a single, easy-to-understand summary. Additionally, similar summary views are available for both Search and Hold within the eDiscovery case. Powered by existing “contextual summary” skill, the system analyzes case/search/hold metadata and generates natural language summaries, providing users with a clear, actionable overview of key details in real time.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot agents in Teams group chats
Description: Now users can discover and add Copilot agents to group chats in Teams to extend Microsoft Copilot to their flow of work.

Title: Planner: Unified Planner tab experience in Microsoft Teams
Description: With this unified tab experience, you can now create and add any basic or premium plan to a Planner tab in Microsoft Teams. To try it, go to any Teams channel and search for Planner after selecting the Apps icon.

Title: Outlook: Drag and drop to download attachments and emails for GCC
Description: Users can drag and drop attachments and emails from the new Outlook for Windows to their desktops or local folders to download them directly to that location. A feature that is already available in world-wide multitenant will now be available for customers in GCC. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): BizChat - Teams Chats in ContextIQ
Description: Users will be able to search for and select Teams Chats in ContextIQ to scope their prompts in BizChat.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
Description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Policy Scoping changes in Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive
Description: Data Loss Prevention for OneDrive for Business will soon support user accounts and groups as part of the policy scoping location picker.

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Require Existing Microsoft 365 Group for New Loop workspaces
Description: Ensure via optional IT admin policy that new shared Loop workspaces are connected to and managed by an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group.

Title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Departed user content workflows for user-owned Loop workspaces
Description: Manage retention and deletion workflows for user-owned Loop workspaces like Copilot Pages when users leave the organization. Notify and provide temporary access to other employees or administrators to save important data before deletion policies take effect.

Title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
Description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Recommended comments
Description: Viva Engage will offer a new way to see contributions from close contacts and leaders within conversation threads. In the home feed, users see two comments that are meaningful to them and the overall conversation. Users can see the rest of the conversation with one click. There are no changes to the comment, reply, or reaction experiences with the new recommended comments feature.

Title: Outlook: Choose between Copilot Business Chat with web or work grounding
Description: In Outlook for iOS and Android, you will soon be able to choose whether Microsoft 365 Copilot Business Chat uses Microsoft 365 Graph (work) or Web grounding via a Work/Web toggle within the chat interface, just like you can at microsoft365.com/chat. Web grounding will be available for all commercial Microsoft 365 customers, while Graph grounding will require a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): UX Transparency for Web Queries
Description: With UX transparency of web grounding in Copilot, users will now be able to see the exact queries sent by Copilot in response to a user's prompt to the web for grounding, along with the list of websites being queried, enhancing their awareness over the process.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - User-level mute
Description: The mute user feature will allow users to remove other users' posts from their feeds and digests. Users cannot mute designated leaders. Muting a user does not block notifications or at-mentions from that user. Admins can turn this feature on or off for the entire network.

Title: Microsoft Intune: MacOS user certs to be deployed in user keychain
Description: We are now announcing a significant enhancement in MacOS: the ability to store certificates in the user keychain. Previously, certificates were automatically stored in the device keychain, regardless of user or device type.

Title: Outlook: Checking feedback policy across all accounts
Description: Currently, when we determine whether a user is entitled to submit feedback, we only look at the feedback policy for their primary (global) account. Going forward, we are going to make the feedback policy check more restrictive which is more secure. We'll be looking at feedback policies for all users' accounts and basing their eligibility off the most restrictive policy value found. For example, if any of the users' accounts have Feedback disabled by a policy, we won't show the Feedback button in the Help tab of the ribbon for any of their accounts. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Edge: v.136 - Elevating top settings and improving settings page navigability
Description: To make finding browser settings more efficient, Microsoft Edge is introducing three navigation improvements to Edge Settings. We are making no changes to the functionality of any setting and all settings will remain on the same page as they are today but will be behind clickable sections. The first is introducing quick access to the most used actions on the landing page of Edge Settings. Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. Third, for these same pages, each section will now click-through to its respective sub-settings (similar to a table of contents).

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: AI Hub - UX enhancements
Description: The UX for Microsoft Purview AI Hub will have enhancements so that more recommendations can be displayed and triaged.

Title: Outlook: Automatically display auto-mapped calendars
Description: Users will be able to automatically see their auto-mapped calendars when toggling from classic Outlook to the new. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on PC supports guest access for events
Description: Mesh events allows for even better collaboration for more people by now supporting guest user attendees into the Mesh PC app. Event organizers can invite guest users outside their organization, providing an opportunity for broader collaboration and networking in Mesh events. Guests can sign in to the Mesh app to join events, participate in discussions, and experience the same interactive features as internal users, all while maintaining secure access control. Guest user creation follows the existing process for tenant guest user creation (outside of Mesh). For this release, guest users would require a Teams Premium license, just like regular tenant attendees, to collaborate within Mesh. Guest access for the Mesh app on Quest and support for anonymous participants will be supported in a future update.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection- User Message Recall in Outlook for encrypted messages
Description: Microsoft Purview Advanced Message Encryption will support Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature for encrypted messages in Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows.

Title: SharePoint: Microsoft Syntex – simple document processing model
Description: A prebuilt model that uses OCR and AI to detect the primary language of the file, key-value pairs, tables, selection marks, and barcodes. As with other models, it can be configured to extract this information to specified library columns.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
Description: Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Mesh app on Meta Quest headsets supports hand interactions
Description: Microsoft Mesh app users on Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro headsets can now use their hands to use the app, move around in event environments, and interact with objects. Motion controllers continue to be supported, and users can switch between using controllers or their hands while using the app.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
Description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

Title: Microsoft Teams: New collaborative Project Studio environment in Microsoft Mesh
Description: The Project Studio environment is a new space for immersive meetings and Mesh events. This space has been designed for synchronous teamwork and productivity for small groups to collaborate on content. Collaboration tools like whiteboards will be added to the environment as they become available.

Title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced device inventory for Windows devices
Description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - New question types
Description: Viva Pulse authors can add new question types, including matrix types, and leverage enhanced logic to drive more targeted survey experiences for respondents.

Title: Outlook: Calendar grid keyboard navigation via arrow keys in new Outlook for Windows and web
Description:
When focused on the calendar grid, you will be able to navigate the time slots on the calendar via left/right/up/down arrow keys in day, week, and work week views. #newoutlookforwindows

While rolling out this feature, we detected an issue specifically affecting Outlook on the Web in the Safari browser. Because of this, we have opted to roll back the existing progression to temporarily remove support for Safari. We have now restarted the rollout and support for Safari is planned to be added by mid-2025.

Title: Microsoft Entra: Conditional Access What If API
Description: Microsoft Entra Conditional Access What If API can be used to programmatically test the impact of conditional access policies on user and workload identity sign-ins.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Microsoft 365 Groups scoping in Teams DLP policy extend protection to 1:1/n chats
Description: When scoping policies to Microsoft 365 Groups in Teams DLP policies, members of Teams standard and shared channel chats associated with the groups are currently protected by the policies. This change will automatically extend the protection to standard/shared channels chats in other Microsfot 365 Groups and 1:1/n (non-channel) chats. There is no longer a need to add users, security groups or other Microsoft 365 groups to protect these chats, except for customers that have enabled optical character recognition (OCR) in Teams chat.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Scheduled prompts
Description: Plan ahead by scheduling essential prompts for repeated tasks in Copilot chat. Create a productive routine that helps you stay organized and efficient.

Title: Microsoft Intune: SCEP certificate delivery
Description: Intune solution for our customers as well as external partners to deliver SCEP certificates with the right security precautions to devices to mitigate the KDC issue.

Title: Microsoft Intune: Endpoint Privilege Management on single session Azure Virtual Desktop
Description: With this release, you can use Endpoint Privilege Management elevation rules and policy to more easily manage standard users on Azure Virtual Desktop.

Title: Outlook: Calendar split view when surface is set to month view
Description: When viewing multiple calendars in month view, users will be able to select "split view" to see those calendars displayed side by side. This feature will be available in new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Outlook: Send updates only to added or removed attendees
Description: When updating meeting attendees, organizers will be prompted with an option to send updates only to added or removed attendees or send updates to all attendees. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Access: Integrate Monaco framework to improve SQL editor capabilities
Description: The Monaco Editor is the fully featured code editor from VS Code with standard IDE functionality such as syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and autocomplete.

Title: Access: Modern Chart Improvements
Description: A top ask from customers is to modernize Access charts and to support better data visualization in Access. To satisfy this user request, we are integrating a new charting package called “Ivy” into Access. Ivy is a charting package written by the Office DVX team that is currently used in Excel, Word, and PowerPoint.

Title: OneNote: Teams Integrations with OneNote Meeting Details
Description: In addition to basic information about a meeting such as date, description, and attendees, Meeting Details will now add content from Teams’ intelligent meeting recap. This includes AI-generated meeting notes, AI-suggested tasks, and any documents shared during the Teams meeting.

Title: Outlook: Organize and reorder folders in the new Outlook for Windows and web
Description: Users can arrange folders in any desired order effortlessly by dragging and dropping the folders in the position that they want. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Teams: In-meeting Error Messaging
Description: Microsoft Teams Meeting users will be notified directly through the error message for why they cannot access meeting chats when their chat access is limited by policy or due to system limitations and unexpected errors. This will only be available in the new Teams experience.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Resize Teams window and left and right panes
Description: Adjust the size of your Teams panes to prioritize what is currently most important for you, and/or snap and resize the Teams window with Windows 11 Snap layouts so you can view multiple applications side by side.

Title: Outlook: Move emails between accounts in the New Outlook for Windows
Description: We’re excited to announce a new feature in Outlook that makes it easier to manage emails across multiple accounts. All personal accounts in the new Outlook for Windows can seamlessly move emails between all their personal accounts, streamlining organization and productivity. For work or school users, this feature is controlled by a policy managed by administrators. By enabling this policy, admins can grant their users the ability to move emails between accounts in a way that aligns with organizational needs and policies. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
Description: We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Usage reports for bookable desks in the Pro Management portal
Description: IT admins can now access reports on bookable desk spaces in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal to assist with workspace optimization and planning. Reports include analytics on peripherals, usage, reservations, and occupancy.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Enable admins to set default document library label based on container label of a group/site/team
Description: This enables admins to inherit document library label from the container label of a group/site/team. New and edited documents within the default document library will be labeled automatically. If the SharePoint admin had already configured a default document library labeling, this setting will not override it.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Best practice configuration monitoring dashboard in Teams admin center
Description: Microsoft recommends best practices to ensure a smooth collaborative experience on Teams. Best Practices dashboard in Teams admin center allows administrators to monitor and promptly address any non-conformance across their organization.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Bulk operations summary in the Teams admin center
Description: IT admins can monitor and track the status of all bulk operations on Teams Devices through the Teams admin center, enabling large-scale management.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
Description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

Title: OneNote: Copilot Chat on OneNote for web and in Teams
Description: Bringing the power of Microsoft Copilot to OneNote for web and in Teams.

Title: Outlook: Sort by category
Description: This adds the ability to sort by category in Outlook for Mac.

Title: Outlook: Sort by Flag option
Description: We are adding support for sort by flag status, flag due date and flag start date.

Title: Microsoft Viva: File and conversation admin settings in Engage admin center
Description: Admins can now manage file and conversation-related settings from the Engage admin center without being routed to the legacy Yammer admin center.

Title: Outlook: Offline app boot
Description: This introduces the ability to open or restart the new Outlook for Windows when not connected to the internet. Previously, you needed a connection to the internet to open or restart the new Outlook. Offline access is only supported when the app is already running and then goes offline. Opening and restarting the app while offline will be introduced with this rollout. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Teams: Voice and face data export controls
Description: This new feature provides controls for voice and face profile data export for users. To ensure security and protection of user privacy, individuals can export their own profile data limiting risk of download or sharing by tenant administrators.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
Description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - AI & Copilot Resources provider
Description: The AI & Copilot Resources provider will power the OOB Microsoft Copilot Academy and will be visible by default to users who have Copilot licenses. Admins will be able to enable, disable, and apply permissions on the content of this provider.

Title: Outlook: Additional formatting options in Outlook for iOS and Android
Description: In response to feedback from you, our customers, we are adding support for even more formatting options when composing in Outlook for iOS or Android! You will be able to choose font size and color, set a default font, as well as clearing and painting formatting.

Title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
Description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Use the Egress API to provide learner access to “My Learning” records
Description: The Egress API can be used by learners to view their My Learning records and corresponding course details.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub - Prompts and responses
Description: Within Microsoft Purview AI Hub, prompts and responses will appear for AI interaction events.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub - Updated permissions
Description: Microsoft Purview AI Hub supports updated permissions including the Microsoft Purview Compliance Administrator role group, Microsoft Purview Security Reader role group, and Microsoft Purview Content Viewer Content Explorer.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Default sensitivity labels and policies enhancements
Description: Eligible customers can activate default labels and policies for Microsoft Purview Information Protection that now extend to meetings.

Title: Microsoft Intune: Enhanced Device Inventory for Windows Devices for Government Cloud (GCCH)
Description: Gain more inventory information about your Windows devices. Choose which device properties you want to collect from which device and then view that information for your devices.

Title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
Description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.

Title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
Description: Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Add brand images in M365 Copilot from SharePoint organization asset libraries
Description: Copilot in PowerPoint and Word connects with your SharePoint organization asset library, making it easy to find and add images approved by your company to keep your presentation or document on brand.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Cross-platform meetings via SIP join for Teams Rooms
Description: Joining SIP-based conferencing services like Google Meet, Zoom, Cisco Webex, and others via Teams Rooms offers a seamless collaboration experience, mirroring the native Teams interface. This integration supports features such as 1080p video, dual screen, various layout options, HDMI input, and others contingent on the third-party platform's in-meeting controls. A SIP calling plan from a CVI partner, currently Pexip, is necessary. This is available for Teams Rooms customers with a Pro license.

Title: Microsoft Teams: Webinar presenter orderability on event page
Description: Users can now customize the list of presenters in the webinar event page via drag and drop functionality. This option can be found under the "Presenter Bio" section of the webinar set-up dialog box.

Title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Publish analyst reports to Viva Insights App
Description: Viva Insights analysts will be able to publish reports they have created to specific recipients in the Viva Insights app.

Title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Generate keyword query language from natural language prompt in eDiscovery with Copilot for Security
Description: Copilot for Security is embedded in eDiscovery to enable users to provide a search prompt in natural language and will translate into keyword query language to help expedite the start of an eDiscovery search.

Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Excel with Python
Description: With Copilot, you can use natural language to describe the analysis you want to perform, and it will automatically generate, explain, and insert Python code into your Excel spreadsheet.
